title: Realm of Dreams
description: The player is transported into a dream world where they must solve riddles, face their fears, and overcome obstacles to find a way back to reality.
subquest: Find the wise dream guide to navigate the dream realm.
Solve the riddles scattered throughout the dream world.
Conquer personal fears manifested as powerful dream monsters.
Discover the hidden keys to unlock the portal back to reality.
Traverse the shifting landscapes and overcome dream obstacles.
Face the ultimate challenge in the dream realm's final trial.
